subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# an [[:w:Chinese numbers#Numeral characters|accounting version]] of the numeral eight that is otherwise written as {{zh-l|八|tr=-}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*brat ~ prat|*brat|cut apart, cut open}}. Cognate to {{zh-m|*別}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=別,八,仈,白,𧧸,識-"to know",曾-"already"}}
Min dialectal word for "to know".

Austroasiatic substrate influence ({{zh-ref|Norman and Mei, 1976}}); may be related to {{zh-m|*別|to split; to differentiate}}. Cognate with {{cog|vi|biết||to know}}, {{cog|mtq|mắt||to know}}, Proto-Bahnaric {{m|mkh-ban-pro|*băt||to remember, to know}}, {{cog|hmx-pro|*pei||to know}} ({{cog|mww|paub||to know, to understand}}).

Many variant written forms exist, but {{lang|zh|捌}} is [http://twblg.dict.edu.tw/holodict_new/iongji/pdf/annesia294pdf.pdf recommended] by Taiwan's Ministry of Education.

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|捌字|捌貨|捌想|毋捌|相捌|捌傳|捌勢|捌事}}
